targets.rawSql:
WITH lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as time,
    m_visits,
    LAG(m_visits) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as prev_m_visits,
    LAG(TIMESTAMP(tmstp)) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as pre_timestamp
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits_today_append`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "$LRA"
        AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
        AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
        AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
    AND $Zeitraum 
    AND 
    CASE "$LRA"
    WHEN "ndr.de" THEN True
    ELSE (
      CASE "$Redaktionen"
        WHEN "Brisant" THEN origin = "sendung"
        WHEN "Jump" THEN origin = "sendung"
        WHEN "Sputnik" THEN origin = "sendung"
        WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN origin = "sendung"
        ELSE True
      END
    )
    END
),
daily_data AS (
  SELECT
     DATE_SUB(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as time,
     DATE_SUB(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL 2 HOUR) as pre_timestamp,
    m_visits as visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted,
    "${type}" as type, "${Zeitraumlabels:text}" as refId
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "$LRA"
    AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
    AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
    AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
    AND $Zeitraum
),
adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_SUB(time, INTERVAL 1 hour) as time,
    DATE_SUB(pre_timestamp, INTERVAL 1 hour) as pre_timestamp,
    -- Calculate time difference in minutes
    TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) as time_diff,
    -- Adjust visits count based on time difference
    CASE
      WHEN FALSE AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10 OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) < 0 AND "${Glaettung:text}" = "Glätten" THEN
        (m_visits - prev_m_visits) / TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) * 10
      ELSE
        m_visits - prev_m_visits
    END as visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted,
    "${type}" as type, 
    "${Zeitraumlabels:text}" as refId
  FROM
    lagged_data
)
SELECT
  TIMESTAMP_ADD(time, INTERVAL 1 SECOND) as time,
  TIMESTAMP_ADD(pre_timestamp, INTERVAL 1 SECOND) as pre_timestamp,
  MAX(ROUND(visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted)) as visits_past_5_minutes,
  type,
  refId,
   "${Glaettung:text}" as glaettung,
   "Zeitraum" as zeitraum
FROM
  ${dataset}
WHERE
  visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted IS NOT NULL
  AND visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted > 0
  AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) = 10 OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, HOUR) = 1
  GROUP BY time, pre_timestamp, type, refId
ORDER BY
  time DESC
  ${lim}

WITH min_time AS (
      SELECT
        MIN(tmstp) as min_tmstp,
        MAX(tmstp) as max_tmstp
        FROM
      (SELECT tmstp
      from
        `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
      WHERE
        $Zeitraum
        AND site_level2 = "$LRA"
        AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
        AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
        AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
        AND $Zeitraum
        AND CASE
          "$LRA"
          WHEN "ndr.de" THEN True
          ELSE (
            CASE
              "$Redaktionen"
              WHEN "Brisant" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Jump" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Sputnik" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN origin = "sendung"
              ELSE True
            END
          )
        END
        ORDER BY tmstp DESC
        ${lim}
        )
    )
    , lagged_data AS (
    SELECT
        TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as time,
        m_visits,
        LAG(m_visits) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as prev_m_visits,
        LAG(TIMESTAMP(tmstp)) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as pre_timestamp
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
     $Vergleichszeitraum
    AND $Zeitraumfever 
    AND site_level2 = "$LRA"
        AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
        AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
        AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
        AND CASE
          "$LRA"
          WHEN "ndr.de" THEN True
          ELSE (
            CASE
              "$Redaktionen"
              WHEN "Brisant" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Jump" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Sputnik" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN origin = "sendung"
              ELSE True
            END
          )
        END
),
adjusted_lagged_data AS (
    SELECT
        time,
        pre_timestamp,
        -- Calculate time difference in minutes
        TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) as time_diff,
        -- Adjust visits count based on time difference
        CASE
            WHEN FALSE AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10 THEN
                (m_visits - prev_m_visits) / TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) * 10
            ELSE
                m_visits - prev_m_visits
        END as visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted
    FROM
        lagged_data
),
daily_data AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(date) as time,
    m_visits as visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted,
    TIMESTAMP_SUB(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) as pre_timestamp
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "$LRA"
    AND $Vergleichszeitraum
    AND site_level2 = "$LRA"
        AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
        AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
        AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
        AND CASE
          "$LRA"
          WHEN "ndr.de" THEN True
          ELSE (
            CASE
              "$Redaktionen"
              WHEN "Brisant" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Jump" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Sputnik" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN origin = "sendung"
              ELSE True
            END
          )
        END
)
SELECT
    DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP_ADD(time, INTERVAL 1 SECOND), INTERVAL ${time_shift} DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as time,
    DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP_ADD(pre_timestamp, INTERVAL 1 SECOND), INTERVAL ${time_shift} DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as pre_timestamp,
    MAX(visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted) as visits_past_5_minutes,
    "${type}" as type,
    "${Vergleichszeitraumlabels:text}" as refId,
    "${Glaettung:text}" as glaettung,
    "Vergleichszeitraum" as zeitraum
FROM
    ${dataset}
WHERE
    visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted IS NOT NULL
    AND visits_past_5_minutes_adjusted > 0
     AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) = 10 OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, HOUR) = 1
GROUP BY time, pre_timestamp, type, refId
ORDER BY
    time DESC

  ${lim}

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Bounce Rate in %')), 'Bounce Rate in %')
FROM(
SELECT 'Bounce Rate in %' as Bounce
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visits' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent/Visit in s')), 'Time spent/Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent/Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio- & Videostarts')), 'Audio- & Videostarts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio- & Videostarts' as Audio_Videostarts
)

-- cache version 

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}

WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
SELECT
        TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as time,
        FIRST_VALUE(m_visits) OVER(ORDER by tmstp DESC) as summe
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`  
  WHERE TRUE
     AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
    AND tmstp  <= DATETIME_SUB("${comp_fever}", INTERVAL $time_shift DAY)
    AND site_level2 = "$LRA"
        AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
        AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
        AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
        AND CASE
          "$LRA"
          WHEN "ndr.de" THEN True
          ELSE (
            CASE
              "$Redaktionen"
              WHEN "Brisant" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Jump" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Sputnik" THEN origin = "sendung"
              WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN origin = "sendung"
              ELSE True
            END
          )
        END
        ORDER BY tmstp DESC
        LIMIT 1
),
daily_data AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  `Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} )
SELECT * FROM ${dataset_kpi}

WITH nachrichten AS (
  SELECT 
  CASE page_chapter2 WHEN "thueringen" THEN "Thüringen" WHEN "sachsen" THEN "Sachsen" WHEN "sachsen-anhalt" THEN "Sachsen-Anhalt" WHEN "deutschland" THEN "Deutschland" WHEN "welt" THEN "Welt" ELSE page_chapter2 END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM   `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("sachsen","sachsen-anhalt","thueringen","deutschland","welt", "hamburg", "info", "mecklenburg-vorpommern", "niedersachsen", "schleswig-holstein") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  GROUP BY page_chapter2
), ratgeber AS(
  SELECT 
  "Ratgeber" as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM   `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "ratgeber" AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  GROUP BY Chapter
--), app_aktuell AS (
--  SELECT
--  "App Aktuell" as Chapter,
--  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
--  FROM Piano.total_visits
--  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("app_aktuell","app-aktuell") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
), ndr_kapitel as (
  SELECT CASE page_chapter1 
    WHEN "nachrichten" THEN "Nachrichten" 
    WHEN "kultur" THEN "Kultur" 
    WHEN "sport" THEN "Sport" 
    WHEN "geschichte" THEN "Geschichte"
    WHEN "ratgeber" THEN "Ratgeber"
    END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM  `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("nachrichten","kultur","sport", "geschichte", "ratgeber") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  GROUP BY Chapter ), mdr as(
 SELECT * FROM(
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM nachrichten
  WHERE Chapter IN ("Thüringen", "Sachsen" ,"Sachsen-Anhalt","Deutschland", "Welt" ) 
UNION ALL
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM ratgeber
--UNION ALL 
--SELECT
--Chapter,
--summe FROM app_aktuell
)), mdr_kapitel AS (
  SELECT CASE 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "sport" THEN "Sport" 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "kultur" THEN "Kultur" 
    WHEN page_chapter1 = "wissen" THEN "Wissen" 
    ELSE page_chapter1
    END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM  `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("sport","wissen","kultur") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  GROUP BY Chapter
), mdr_not_nachrichten AS (
  SELECT * FROM mdr_kapitel
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM nachrichten
  WHERE Chapter IN ("Thüringen", "Sachsen" ,"Sachsen-Anhalt","Deutschland", "Welt" )
)
SELECT 
    Chapter, 
    summe 
FROM 
    (SELECT 
         'ndr_kapitel' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
     FROM ndr_kapitel
     UNION ALL
     SELECT 
         'mdr' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
      FROM mdr
      UNION ALL
     SELECT 
         'nachrichten' as source_table, 
         Chapter, 
         summe 
     FROM nachrichten
     UNION ALL
     SELECT
     'mdr_not_nachrichten' as source_table,
     Chapter,
     summe
     FROM mdr_not_nachrichten) as unified_table
WHERE 
    source_table = CASE WHEN '$LRA' = 'ndr.de' AND "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten" THEN 'nachrichten'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'ndr.de' AND "$Redaktionen"!= "nachrichten" THEN 'ndr_kapitel'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'mdr.de' AND "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten" THEN 'mdr'
                        WHEN '$LRA' = 'mdr.de' AND "$Redaktionen" != "nachrichten" THEN 'mdr_not_nachrichten'
                    END
ORDER BY 
    summe DESC

SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
  ${articles_table:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY 4 DESC 

LIMIT 100

sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
CONCAT(CONCAT(

  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END ,

  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 
m_av_playbacks,
CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
  ${av_table:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
AND "$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "ondemand"
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote})
WHERE m_av_playbacks > 0
GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,av_content_duration,av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

query.rawSql:

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Vorletzte Stunde"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "Heute vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

query.rawSql:
SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN 0
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  ""
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "_last_hour"
  ELSE ""
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "_last_2_hour"
  ELSE ""
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "_today"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "_last_hour"
  ELSE "_daily"
  END

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', last_sunday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', last_saturday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', interval_7_day)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', interval_30_day)
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(yesterday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(last_saturday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_7_day, INTERVAL 7 DAY))

    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(last_sunday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_7_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_30_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  " EXTRACT(Hour from tmstp) <= ((SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM max_tmstp) from min_time))"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  " EXTRACT(Hour from tmstp) <= ((SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM max_tmstp) from min_time))"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN  "EXTRACT(Hour from tmstp) <= 24"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "DATETIME_DIFF((SELECT min_tmstp FROM min_time), tmstp, MINUTE) <=70 AND tmstp <= ((SELECT min_tmstp FROM min_time))"
  ELSE "True"
  END
